name: Dating Simulator
description:
Create your character and start matching via the phone app. Buy new clothes, cars, houses to impress people. Set up a meeting with the person you match with the right dialogues. Earn money by working various jobs and buy gifts for the person you meet. Eat at the restaurant or have a drink at the bar. Try to establish the right dialogues according to the personality of the person in front of you. If you're in a low mood, you might consider going to a strip club.

A simulation game with a happy ending in bed.
